dict.acceptation: 书桌，办公桌；服务台；部门；（美）讲道台；

sent.orig: Control desk. cpl-View or set display settings.
sent.trans: 控制desk.cpl-查看或设置显示设置。

sent.orig: Please check in at the information counter (front desk, reception desk, etc.) in the lobby.
sent.trans: 请在大堂问询处（前台，接待处，等等）登记。

sent.orig: You've got a great job.A desk job.I'd kill for a desk job.
sent.trans: 你有份不错的工作。坐办公室。我羡慕死办公室工作了。

sent.orig: My friend graciously shared his cupcakes with class, patiently taking the tray from desk to desk.
sent.trans: 我的朋友慷慨地与全班同学分享蛋糕，耐心地端着盘子从一个书桌到另一个书桌。

sent.orig: The key to the experiment is this desk -- a type of adjustable-height school desk.
sent.trans: 的关键，这是实验台-一种可调高度课桌。
